price: Mwenyezi Mungu amewaandalia adhabu kali. Kwa hakika waliyo kuwa wakiyatenda ni maovu kabisa.
arabic: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu amewatengenezea hawa wanaafiki adhabu ya mwisho wa ukali. Hakika vitendo vyao walivyo kuwa wakivitenda, vya unaafiki, na kuchukua viapo vya uwongo, ni viovu mno.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: aʿadda al-lahu lahum ʿadhāban shadīdan innahum sāa mā kānū yaʿmalūna
